basic_data.human_name: The Iceberg Hidden Gems Bundle
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb:
Settle in for a cool beginning of 2026 with Iceberg Interactive’s Hidden Gems. Survey your capitalism kingdom, and strive to drive a profit as the King of Retail. Wield Gloom Girl’s Doomblade destroy the Dread Lords in an energetic 2D metroidvania. Or, live a pirate’s life on the PVP seas with Blazing Sails. Limitless adventures await across multiple genres, and every purchase benefits Doctors Without Borders/Médecins Sans Frontières!

Keys expire. Please redeem before February 6, 2027, at 11:00 PM Pacific Time.
basic_data.description:
Chill out with Iceberg. Settle in for a cool beginning of 2026 with Iceberg Interactive’s Hidden Gems. Survey your capitalism kingdom, and strive to drive a profit as the King of Retail. Wield Gloom Girl’s Doomblade destroy the Dread Lords in an energetic 2D metroidvania. Or, live a pirate’s life on the PVP seas with Blazing Sails. Limitless adventures await across multiple genres, and every purchase benefits Doctors Without Borders/Médecins Sans Frontières!

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the games in this bundle is as much as $212. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase. Pay $5 or more to access Steam keys.

Redeem on Steam. All of the games in this bundle are available on Steam for Windows — and some for Mac and Linux too.

Keys expire. Please redeem before February 6, 2027, at 11:00 PM Pacific Time.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Doctors Without Borders. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

blazingsails.callout: Fight for survival in this fast-paced pirate PvP game! Create your own unique pirate and ship. Band together with other players to command your vessel and eliminate other crews in epic battles on land and sea.
blazingsails.description_text:
Explore different game-modes!

In Treasure Hunt you and your crew must search islands for treasure chests! Treasures can be turned in at one of the 2 outposts at the centre of the map in exchange for gold. Get more gold than your enemies to win!

Our Battle Royale offers a unique take on the genre. Enjoy a dynamic mix of swashbuckling on dry land and epic naval battles! Sink every other crew to emerge victorious.

Tired of looting? No problem! Jump straight into the action in our all new Galleon Conquest game mode. Experience movie-like broadside battles with a HUGE Galleon! Frag pirates, sink other ships and capture flags to win!

Part of the ship, part of the crew

Who knew being a pirate actually takes teamwork? Well, it does! Along with your fellow crew members you'll need to steer, repair and re-supply your ship while besieging enemy crews. Communication and cooperation are essential to secure a victory!

Choose your vessel!

A variety of ship types offer distinctly different play styles for your crew. The Brigantine is the classic - with a hull that can take a pounding and some serious firepower. The Junk Ship is smaller, faster and packs a front-facing cannon for daring head-on assaults! The Bomb Vessel is especially powerful at long distances with its unique mortar cannon. For the smaller crews there's a 2-player Sloop. But don't let its size fool you! The Sloop can easily go toe to toe with the bigger 4-player ships.

Equip a variety of legendary pirate arrrms

Change your playstyle based on the weapons you plunder. Take to the crow’s nest with your trusty sharpshooter, or board an enemy ship with the legendary life-stealing Sword of the Sea! Like something more explosive? Try the shoulder-cannon or fish-launcher. To each their own!


Build-A-Buccaneer

No two ships or pirates are the same! Show off your booty with a swath of customisable parts, clothing and accessories - embroidered jackets, gilded hulls, golden peg legs - you’ll get real fancy, real fast

mahokenshi.callout: Begin your journey to become a mighty samurai mage! In a blend of adventure, strategy, and deckbuilding gameplay, choose how you will follow the way of the Mahoken. Build your deck, battle demons, and protect the Celestial Islands.
mahokenshi.description_text:
BECOME A MIGHTY MAHOKENSHI 

A SAMURAI MAGE

Wielding both blade and magic, it is your duty to protect the floating Celestial Islands from powerful opponents who seek to corrupt them. Challenge your fate and build your card deck to defeat foes and complete missions. Evolve your character with every playthrough, and become the Mahokenshi the world needs.

CHOOSE YOUR SAMURAI HOUSE

Where will you start your journey? Will you hail from the sturdy House of Sapphire? The cunning House of Topaz? The fierce House of Ruby? Or the secretive House of Jade? Each house draws its strength from a different elemental spirit and allows you to create different playstyles.

BUILD YOUR DECK STRATEGICALLY

There are more than 200 lovingly illustrated cards to discover. Begin with a basic set of cards and choose how to build your deck as you defeat formidable foes, uncover treasures, and find remote locations. Be careful, as each terrain offers different advantages, so plan your actions with the surroundings in mind. Evolve your playstyle and strategy in every mission and leverage the strengths of your samurai house to create powerful combos.

EXPLORE THE CELESTIAL ISLANDS

Travel a vast array of vibrant and beautifully designed 3D maps. Meet the different people of the Celestial Islands, save villages, discover shrines and defeat deadly demons. See your battles brought to life with fully animated characters. Perform magical maneuvers, fiery attacks, strong defensive moves, and swift counterattacks on your way to restoring peace to the world.

humblemonthly_10percentoff_general.human_name: 10% off your first month of Humble Choice
humblemonthly_10percentoff_general.description_text:
Get 10% off one month of a Humble Choice subscription when you purchase this bundle!

NOTE: Expiration date is located on your download page for this bundle. Eligible for new subscribers. Payment will be applied on the first payment for new subscribers.

kingofretail.callout: The store is your kingdom! Expand your humble boutique into a thriving business: hire the right staff, decorate your displays, and lure in customers. Even your wildest ideas can turn a profit.
kingofretail.description_text:
Ever wanted to start your own business? In King of Retail, anything is possible!

Plan a shop theme and store design, and launch your very own enterprise. The store is your kingdom, and if you run it well you might be able to expand into a larger corporation! If you get it wrong… well, blame it on the economy.



Get Rich, Your Own Way

It’s your store, and you can sell whatever you want! Want to run a shop that only sells chicken? Do it! Every kind of electronic, and also fresh foods? Why not!

Design and customize your store, and achieve your dreams of running a unique emporium of your very own.



Make a Customer, Not a Sale

The secret is, you need people to choose YOUR location to spend their hard-earned money. What makes your store the best? Do you have the best shelf-stockers in town, or the most convincing salespeople? Maybe you simply have well-targeted online ads. There are many ways to make your store stand out!

Watch your customers closely! Study their behavior and figure out what makes them pull out their wallets. Then, do more of it!



Turn Employees Into Brand Ambassadors

Humanize your brand by hiring humans ⁠— the right ones! Conduct interviews with prospective employees to find the best mix of skills and culture fit. Negotiate salaries, manage shifts, and train people up so they thrive and grow with you



Don’t Get Comfortable

Why settle for one shop, when you could run a whole chain? Invest money in advertising to bring in greater throngs of customers; rebrand your store’s interior design; and keep optimising stock and pricing to maximize your profit. If it all pays off, you might be able to incorporate and expand into multiple stores across the city!



Your Company is an Extension of You

It’s your store, and you can run it how you want. Micro-manage every detail and constantly adjust for optimal profit, or just watch the ebb and flow of your perfect masterpiece. You’re your own boss and you can play your own way ⁠— it’s good to be the king.

hellbreach_vegas.callout: A wave-based First-Person Shooter for 1-4 players! Set your loadout, kill, and earn cash. Take a spin on the various slot machines and level up to improve your survival chances. Are you ready to try your luck?
hellbreach_vegas.description_text:
Hellbreach: Vegas is a wave-based demon shooter, made by Ash, the one-man army behind Infinity Ape Studios. Play as a solo survivor or a team of up to four and face a demonic threat. Set new records as you shoot your way through waves of demons in the neon-lit streets of Las Vegas.

SEND THEM BACK TO HELL

Slay your way through a series of maps, each round more challenging than the last. Earn cold hard cash to upgrade your guns, and unlock other bonuses that will help you survive what’s to come.

FIGHT WAVE AFTER WAVE

Unlock over 19 weapons. Slaughter demons in your preferred style with a combination of modern and futuristic firearms and melee weapons.

PLAY THE GAME OF CHANCE

What happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas, so you might as well play the slots! Run the 'Win A Weapon' machine for a wide variety of weapons, or try your chances on our 'Spin A Boost' for a power-up. Not done winning? Give the 'Bag A Prize’ or 'Rand A Bang' machines a shot. Are you just looking to unlock those awesome cosmetics? Play our 'Pull A Skull' Machine for a chance to increase your end-game payout.

EXPLORE THE POSSIBILITIES

Endure endless rounds in our 'Survive' mode to see demon bodies pile up and go for a high score. Looking for something more confined? Play on a challenging smaller version of the map in 'Trapped'. Alternatively, just looking to hone your marksmanship? Try 'Gun Pro' instead to train your accuracy with every weapon type. Not done yet? Try your luck in our two other game modes: 'Royale' and 'Nightmare'.

FEATURES

  • 5 game modes: Survive, Trapped, Gun Pro, Nightmare Mode and Royale.

  • 9 maps + 1 practice map

  • 19 guns

  • 3 melee weapons

  • 12 perks

  • 5 slot machines

  • 10 enemy types

minicology.callout: You have crash-landed into a mini-verse of tiny planets. Embark on an interstellar survival sandbox journey. Use your crafting, combat, and automation skills to survive the many challenges this mini-verse throws at you.
minicology.description_text:
Note: Demo progress and settings transfer over to the main game automatically! Locked recipes and settings will become available as soon as you load your demo save.

Survive, Craft, Battle, Automate and Explore . Minicology lets you take to the stars and travel through a procedurally-generated universe of tiny planets! Build bases, defend against invasions, terraform worlds, and engineer factories that automatically farm and mine. Minicology encourages creative solutions to everything — from cultivating plants to fighting enemies!

Immerse yourself in a world where self-sufficiency is key. Gather valuable resources, grow your own crops and learn to automate any process. Use item pipes to automate processes and transfer materials around your base, hunt for food, harness energy, and secure your water source as you navigate the challenges of this miniature universe - but it doesn't stop there — get creative and construct a fully-fledged base, that can repel invaders and stand as a testament to your survival skills.

Mechanisms and components can be manufactured from basic raw materials — but some rare items can only be found by completing events or fighting enemies. As you venture further into deep space, 900+ items and 20+ different crafting stations will provide you with countless opportunities to progress. Set up auto-harvesters and harness the simulated water cycle to make sure you’re always stocked with food, wood, and materials for your next adventure — then set up an interstellar shipping network to launch your materials back home!

As you roam the cosmos, be careful that you don’t disturb the dangerous predators of the mini-verse. Well, actually, you’ll probably want to — they’ve got some of the best loot in the galaxy! Combat isn’t restricted to weapons. Players can change the weather, automate turrets, and harness chemistry to inflict damage on bosses or morph the world around you!

Fix your rocket and take to the skies. Diverse planet clusters with different biomes await you. Fly around an endless procedurally-generated universe and expand your horizons. Find new resources, fight new bosses, and save planetary systems from certain doom by completing procedurally generated objectives. The universe is your oyster.

Minicology’s event system will keep you on your toes — each planet type has unique simulated weather and event rotations. A planet might not be the same the next time you visit! Meteor impacts will have you racing against the clock, while icy planets feature bitterly cold nights that leave you chasing for shelter — but certain rare materials will only be available during these dangerous events. Make sure you’re prepared!

Key features

  • Sandbox-style building & terraforming mechanics. Make your planet your way!
  • Survive by hunting, farming, or a mix of the two - just don't hunt a species into extinction!
  • Automate your base: pipe items from chests into furnaces, synthesize new materials, and irrigate your farms.
  • Dozens of unique events and objectives, ranging from meteor showers to boss battles
  • Massive procedural universe, with an objective system that keeps gameplay fresh
  • 8 Challenging boss battles
  • Craft accessories, armor and weapons to flesh out your build
  • Don't lose track of time! Immersive day/night cycle, with unique events tied to each!
  • And yes, the planets are actually round.
  • Your actions have consequences: animals can be driven to extinction, and players can trigger hazardous weather conditions

couponstrangehorticulture60off.description_text:
Get 60% off Strange Horticulture in the Humble Store!

NOTE: Expires February 20th, 2026, 6pm PST. Does not stack with Humble Store sales.

Find and identify new plants, pet your cat, speak to a coven, or join a cult. Use your growing collection to influence the story and unravel Undermere’s dark mysteries.

Welcome to Undermere, a quaint town surrounded by hag-infested forests and rugged mountains. You are the Horticulturist, owner of local plant store Strange Horticulture. As a cast of colorful customers come by your shop, you are quickly thrust into an occult mystery stretching back hundreds of years.

Explore the lands beyond your store to find new plants, but be careful! The dark woods and lakes are not always friendly to a simple herbalist. You might discover powers beyond your wildest dreams - or lose your mind completely. Use context clues to determine which places to visit, and which to avoid!

Using your trusty encyclopedia and clues found on your explorations, you learn more about the strange plants you come across. By identifying each plant, you will be able to use their effects to influence the story -- from hypnotic hallucinogens to powerful poisons.

techsupport_errorunknown.callout: Things are not what they seem at your new tech support specialist job. While resolving customer issues, you soon find yourself in the middle of a conspiracy. Will you side with your employer, join a rogue hacktivist group, or assist the police
techsupport_errorunknown.description_text:
“On behalf of Quasar Telecommunications, I am happy to welcome you in our family. You are part of our exciting new program allowing technical support specialists to work directly from home. Your new Spectrum system will connect you directly with our customers through the Support Desk.”

Tech Support: Error Unknown is an adventure game with simulation and puzzle mechanics, which places you in front of a virtual computer. As a tech support specialist new to the job, use a wide array of computer software to solve customer issues or choose to manipulate programs for personal gain. Hack your system to unlock its full potential, GPS track lost phones, scan profiles to blackmail customers, or simply propose they reboot.

While on the job, you discover a conflict between your corporate employer and an anonymous rogue hacktivist group, trying to take them down. Will you climb the corporate ladder, secretly join the hacktivists, or help the police expose them? Alternatively, will you pursue a more personal agenda?

Key features
  • Engage customers and colleagues through a novel procedural dialogue system
  • Choose how to approach each situation in a sandbox computer environment
  • Decide who to side with and unlock new gameplay
  • Discover more than 20 major and minor endings
  • Mouse-only controls make the game accessible for all

doctors_without_borders.description_text:
Payments to Doctors Without Borders/Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) are made via PayPal Giving Fund.

Doctors Without Borders/Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) is an international, independent medical humanitarian organization that delivers emergency aid to people affected by armed conflict, epidemics, natural and man-made disasters, and exclusion from health care in nearly 70 countries.

clem.callout: A narrative-driven puzzle adventure game with a dark twist. Wake up in a world where puzzles intertwine with exploration, weaving a unique narrative rooted in alchemy.
clem.description_text:
You awaken in a cold, dimly lit room, your senses slowly adjusting to the surroundings that, oddly, feel familiar. A strange sensation lingers in you, reminding you that something is not quite right. As you find your bearings, your attention is drawn to a peculiar item on the ground. A notebook labeled "CLeM" lies before you. As you delve into its pages, covered with intricate sketches of insects accompanied by vague symbols, you find a note containing a cryptic message: “Bring me BEAUTY.” Lost in deciphering the contents, a voice interrupts your focus.

Puzzles intertwine with exploration, weaving a unique narrative experience we call “Puzzlevania” with a shadowy story to unravel and countless challenges to overcome.

Craft magic toys to unveil hidden secrets, access unreachable spots, and reclaim items from the past as you uncover new revelations in familiar spaces.

Investigate a seemingly desolate house accompanied only by an obscure voice and a notebook full of annotations and drawings on alchemy, insects, and other creepy crawlies.

Choose your fate in this dark story of manipulation, pride, forgiveness, and redemption.

Features:

  • A new genre, “Puzzlevania,” intertwines puzzles and exploration. Discover hidden secrets in each room as you delve deeper into the mysteries with every crafted magical toy.

  • Unique and beautiful art style with hand-drawn elements.

  • 2D graphics with 3D environmental navigation.

  • Challenging and diverse puzzles to solve.

  • An enigmatic story with a dark turn.

lunacy_saintrhodes.callout: A first-person psychological horror adventure game. Explore your dark family history, solve puzzles, and experience a gut-wrenching feeling of terror. You are being watched; never alone, never safe.
lunacy_saintrhodes.description_text:
Explore your dark family history in Lunacy: Saint Rhodes, a first-person psychological horror adventure game in which you feel the distinct feeling of terror at your every step.

What truly happened in Saint Rhodes?

Lunacy: Saint Rhodes is a first-person psychological horror adventure game in which you seek the truth behind your family’s horrific murder. Investigate the history behind your ancestral home and the town of Saint Rhodes, while fighting to survive against what haunts it. Uncover your family’s troubled past as you descend further and further into insanity.

Expect the unexpected

Lunacy: Saint Rhodes is a truly terrifying experience, featuring a detailed world that tells the story of what happened in the haunted town of Saint Rhodes. Frightening creatures roam the town, as you explore Saint Rhodes in search of clues to help you survive.

Key features

  • Experience a truly disturbing haunted town
  • True atmospheric horror achieved by the beautifully crafted environments of Saint Rhodes
  • Mind-bending puzzles designed to challenge your wits
  • Petrifying story involving a family with a dark past
  • Terrifying enemies that all require a different approach
  • Two endings to uncover

doomblade.callout: Deep underground, Gloom Girl discovers DOOMBLADE, a sentient weapon hellbent on escape after eons in chains. Together, “Doom and Gloom” embark on a vengeful quest to unlock powerful abilities and destroy the Dread Lords in this 2D Action Metroidvania.
doomblade.description_text:
Lured out of her solitude, Gloom Girl discovers a chamber containing DOOMBLADE: a sentient weapon, trapped and bound for eons. “Doom and Gloom” join forces and begin a quest to regain the blade’s powers and exact vengeance on its captors.

Wielding DOOMBLADE, Gloom Girl can ride through the air to attack enemies. Target monsters to attack them directly, and slay them with DOOMBLADE’s wrath!

The blade hungers for vengeance on the Dread Lords, who bound it in chains and stripped it of its powers. But first, it must regain its strength. Search for demonic shrines, where DOOMBLADE’s powers were hidden and stored by the long dead Gloomfolk, awaiting its return. Then use Doom Drop, Wicked Wind, and the Nightmare Onion to teach your enemies fear.

From the abandoned halls of Gloomhaunt, into the New Wilderwood forest full of untrusting tribesmen, through the Molded Mines with their hedonistic shroom people, and into a technological hellscape known as the Power Sector. Gloom Girl must fight her way through these interconnecting worlds and destroy the monsters within as she hunts down the Dread Lords who imprisoned DOOMBLADE.

starsinshadow.callout: A turn-based 4X strategy game and a vivid tribute to the genre classics. Compete with alien factions to explore and colonize nearby starsystems, build fleets, and negotiate or conquer to unify the galaxy.
starsinshadow.description_text:
Stars in Shadow is a turn-based 4X science fiction strategy game. Explore the stars, settle distant worlds, and build an interstellar empire. Recover ancient technologies and negotiate with alien leaders. Created by a pair of passionate strategy gamers, Stars in Shadow features streamlined empire management, sophisticated turn-based tactical combat, and detailed world building.

FEATURES

  • Epic Scope:
    Starting at the dawn of interstellar travel, progress through four eras of technological advancement. Discover the science of planetary terraforming, upgrade your infantry battalions to battle mechs, and grow your fleet from a squadron of destroyers to an armada of planet-destroying Dread Stars.
  • Varied Factions:
    7 Playable factions comprising six alien races. Each faction has different research strengths and technology options. Forming alliances, conquering neighboring species, or discovering ancient artifacts may open up additional avenues of research. Choose your race wisely as it impacts which worlds will suit you, what trades or alliances may be offered, and whether or not your neighbors are inclined to trust you.
  • Stylized Setting:
    A distinctive comic-book art style and an original, detailed universe backstory draw you into an immersive game world. Interact with a unique cast of alien characters, make friends and influence people, or crush your enemies and see them driven before you.
  • Focused High-Level Strategy:
    Build a vast and varied empire, taking advantage of the unique traits offered by different alien populations and the worlds they inhabit. Experiments on a slave population might diminish your popularity in the Galactic Council. A streamlined resource and planetary improvement model keeps the game moving even when your empire grows large.
  • Deep Turn-Based Tactical Combat:
    Face off against your opponents in complex 2D turn-based tactical battles. Counter your enemy’s missile barrage using point defense or interceptors, then close to energy weapon range! Stars in Shadow ’s tactical engine includes several features rarely seen in turn based games. Multi-ship commands keep even large fleet battles fast-paced, and smart unit behaviors allow tight control with minimal micromanagement. Auto-resolve battles that are a foregone conclusion, while retaining the ability to replay any engagement to see exactly what happened.

 

Stars in Shadow © 2016 Ashdar Games INC. Developed by Ashdar Games INC. Licensed exclusively to and published worldwide by Iceberg Interactive. Iceberg Interactive design and mark are registered trademarks of Iceberg Interactive B.V. Microsoft®, Windows® and DirectX® are registered trademarks of Microsoft Corporation. All other brands, product names, and logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners. All rights reserved. Made in Canada.

orientalempires.callout: This turn-based 4X strategy game recreates the civilizations of ancient China. Develop your land, build great cities, raise huge armies, and fight epic battles with hundreds of soldiers on the map
orientalempires.description_text:
Step into the world of the ancient Orient. Control a city or tribe from the dawn of Chinese history, and turn it into a great empire. Develop your land, create great cities, raise huge armies and fight epic wars. Advance your technology, culture and religion to create one of mankind’s great civilizations. All the action takes place on one spectacular game map that brings to life the mountains, forests, plains and deserts of China. Zoom in close to review your troops and see your peasants toiling, or zoom out for a strategic overview. Plan your battles, end your turn, and then watch as your armies obey your orders, with hundreds of soldiers battling right on the game map.

FEATURES

  • Start out as a single nation or tribe, starting from humble beginnings with a single settlement and expand your empire and develop your culture with the aim of becoming the universally recognized Son of Heaven and ruler of the world.

  • Persuade the other factions to recognize you as such by either military force, or by diplomatic persuasion.

  • Play as one of 24 different factions each with their own special bonuses or penalties.

  • Vast beautifully rendered map featuring an attractive and authentic depiction of the landscape of China and Mongolia.

  • Large scale battles with hundreds or thousands of soldiers, depicted in detail right on the game map. Watch skilled armies and reinforcements go to battle, according to the battle orders and formations set by the player.

  • Fully animated 3D models, with variations in face and clothing for each model, including infantry, cavalry, chariot and artillery units, as well as naval forces.

  • Long seamless zoom range lets you step right into the game world or zoom out for a strategic overview.

  • Develop your settlements by constructing buildings and developing the landscape around them, build markets and ports to enable trade by land and water.

  • Elaborate research tree including technology as well as cultural, philosophical and religious developments.

  • Many other elements will determine the outcome of you quest for dominance such as Leaders, Sieges, Unrest and Rebellion, and Authority and Culture ratings.

  • As Emperor, set edicts, laws and decrees to balance power and move into a glorious new Era, with new technologies and military units that change the game!

  • Conquer together or betray your allies. Anything goes in multiplayer mode, supporting up to 15 players.

doctors_without_borders.description_text:
Payments to Doctors Without Borders/Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) are made via PayPal Giving Fund.

Doctors Without Borders/Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) is an international, independent medical humanitarian organization that delivers emergency aid to people affected by armed conflict, epidemics, natural and man-made disasters, and exclusion from health care in nearly 70 countries.

basic_data.human_name: Make Music, Change Lives
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb:
It’s not easy to compose the perfect piece, but an asset library full of beats, clips, and instruments certainly helps. Our latest bundle has the ideal mix of sound files and melodies that span every genre you can think up, from orchestral epics to house beats to the cyberpunk trills of the future. Inside you’ll find looping synths, organs, guitars, and even a ukulele ensemble alongside a variety of genres like cumbia, R&B, funk, and alt rock—perfect for crafting the fitting atmospheres for all your creative projects.

Valued at roughly $970, this collection includes well over 10,000 loops, samples, and MIDI files for your productions. Soundtrack Loops contributes 7,559 professionally produced sounds, and at the top-tier bundle, the included Mixcraft DAW adds thousands more instruments, effects, and loops you can use to build full arrangements. Everything is royalty-free and ready for use in popular music software.

You choose what you pay to make the sound you’re looking for—and help fund student music programs with Music Will through your purchase!
basic_data.description:
Your move, maestro. It’s not easy to compose the perfect piece, but an asset library full of beats, clips, and instruments certainly helps. Our latest bundle has the ideal mix of sound files and melodies that span every genre you can think up, from orchestral epics to house beats to the cyberpunk trills of the future. Inside you’ll find looping synths, organs, guitars, and even a ukulele ensemble alongside a variety of genres like cumbia, R&B, funk, and alt rock, perfect for crafting the fitting atmospheres for all your creative projects. You choose what you pay to make the sound you’re looking for, and help fund student music programs with Music Will with your purchase!

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $958. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem DRM-Free. All of the software in this bundle is available DRM-Free. Redemption codes must be redeemed by user no later than March 31, 2027.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Music Will. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

indiepopsoundtrackloops.description_text: Soundtrack Loops intros Indie Pop Loops & One-shots. California producer Dylan Swirkal (Melodic Techno, Tech House Punch, Drum ‘n’ Bass Synths) is adept at putting together focused collections of highly textured music and sound that span a wide range of ambient and electronic music forms, from beatless compositions with a cinematic feel, to distilled techno and drum ‘n’ bass workouts that are at once authentic and forward-looking. Indie Pop has the same signature—it’s an artful blend of laid-back feels anchored in dreampop, study beats and rock, and rolled in familiar chord progressions to provide compelling music in nearly any modern pop scenario. Here we have a good supply of everything it takes to make complete tracks: drums and percussion, bass, guitar, piano, synths, and FX. A solid set of drum, guitar, and effects one shots complete the package, making it a high-value choice for modern music production in all pop genres. Over the course of 99 loops and 19 one shots, Indie Pop is an exercise in taste, texture, and variety—a balanced, well-considered, and expertly produced collection of sounds that can generate rich, full and very pleasing tracks. In combination with all the other pop tiles in the Soundtrack Loops catalog, Indie Pop takes on even more value, in light of its unique applicability across the pop music universe. Features: 99 Royalty Free Indie Pop Loops | 16 One-shots | Universal .WAV, & Apple Looped .AIFF Included | 48kHz 24 bit stereo files.

lofiandhigh.description_text: Soundtrack Loops presents Montra – Lofi & High. Montra – LoFi & High demonstrates an air of chill accompanied by deep analog Bass hits and mellow melody synth pads and sound effects. Each loop is infused with zen moments and touches on pleasure receptors in the mind’s eye. These sounds bend and flex perfectly for Cinematic scores, dream sequences, music to study to, Hip Hop, Chill Hop, Chillwave, and Downtempo. Montra met many a sunrise in his den, chakras aligned and incense lit, holding space specifically to craft these soulistic sounds using the best analog and FM Synthesis gear. No VSTs used. All unique sounds are handcrafted and gluten-free. Features: 108 Royalty Free Lofi Beats & Loops | Universal .WAV, & Apple Loop .AIFF included | 24 bit 44.1k Stereo Files

upbeatfunkyguitars.description_text: Soundtrack Loops intros their latest royalty-free audio pack, Upbeat & Funky Guitars Loops! This powerhouse collection is bursting with energy, delivering 101 loops that are the heartbeat of any funk-inspired production. From 90 to 124 BPM, each loop is crafted to perfection, bringing the vibrant pulse of funk, disco, and groove right into your DAW. With every loop precisely tagged by Key and BPM

electrofied.description_text: Soundtrack Loops presents Electrofied. Electrofied is a massive collection of the hottest electro loops and samples. Includes both old school Electro Synth Pop style loops and Dirty Electro Synth loops. Sound folders include Vocoded Vocals, Analogue Synths, Vintage Organs, Catchy Arpeggiations, Glitch Elements, Minimal Drum Patterns, Complete Beats, Thick Pads, and much more.

chillbassandguitars.description_text: Chill Bass and Guitar studio instrument loops bring a soothing vibe to any in-house or personal productions. Great for Cinematic movie themes, Hip Hop, Downtempo, Chillout and Pop. Performed by musician and producer Adonis Tsilimparis. Features: 74 Royalty Free Chillout Bass Loops | Universal .WAV, & Apple Looped .AIFF Included | 44.1kHz 16 bit stereo files.

epicorchestral.description_text: Action! Suspense… DRAMA and wHiMsY – This set of Epic Orchestral loops is designed for film scoring. Remix each piece into a customized soundtrack or use the instrument loops as standalone elements to sculpt screen action into crescendo. All film aside, we also recommend using these sounds in other genres such as Trap, Hip Hop, Dubstep, EDM, Break Beat, and Industrial. Three kits are in the 80 BPM range and three kits are in the 120 BPM range. The various keys are as follows: a minor, c# minor, c minor, A major, C# major, and F# major. Good for battle scenes, high action, drama, soft and playful, epic adventure, and, of course, scenes of suspense. Composed by John Hobart (Scorpio Music Productions). 24 bit 44.1kHz Stereo files. Tempo and key information are in the file names as well as metadata. Features: 145 Royalty Free Orchestral Instrument Loops | 5 MIDI | 24 bit 44.1 Stereo Files

littlekidsrock.description_text:
Donations to support Musci Will are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Music Will runs the largest nonprofit music program in the US public school system. Our teachers currently serve over 500,000 students in more than 600 cities and towns across the country.

We believe that music education is a right, not a privilege, and it should reflect the cultures of the students it serves.

That’s why, for two decades now, our programs have taught students such popular American genres as rock, pop, R&B, Latin, rap and country—alongside styles already taught in schools, such as classical and jazz.

Today, a national network of K-12 districts has adopted the Music Will program as their own.

More than 70 colleges and universities now teach our approach to their music education majors. Several state departments of education have partnered with Music Will to grow music education in the schools they serve.

Our mission of transforming lives by transforming music education has grown into a movement.

ukelele.description_text: Soundtrack Loops intros their latest royalty-free audio pack, Ukulele Loops by none other than Felix fast4ward. Featuring a diverse range of tempos and styles, Ukulele Loops by Felix Fast4ward includes strums, plucks, and melodies that are perfect for adding a touch of warmth and positivity to your tracks. Whether you’re producing pop, folk, acoustic, or even experimental genres, these loops offer endless creative possibilities.

altrock.description_text: For producing Alternative Rock. Alt.Rock ReMastered loops from Soundtrack Loops will take you on a journey through the light, the dark, the mellow, and the heavy. This contemporary set of audio tools provides all aspects of Modern Rock. It comes packed full of rhythm guitars, lead guitars, guitar SFX, drum loops, drum one-shots, electric beats, and electric basses. 302 loops and 36 drum one-shots. Tempos range from 115 to 145 BPMs. Instruments organized by Key. Written and Performed by Burton L. Markham.

funkanddiscobasses.description_text: Funk and Disco Bass is a collection of live electric Bass guitar loops in various tempos and keys. Good for Disco, Funk, and Dance. Inspired by classics from the 70s and beyond. There are 101 loops in multiple formats and each download format includes folders of the sliced Recycle loop files. These sliced Recycle files are great to chop basslines up and make something entirely new using Reason or Ableton Live. Electric Bass loops sounds like Sly Stone, Earth Wind & Fire, Kool & The Gang, and Daft Punk. Each Funk & Disco Bass loop contains Key and BPM information with in the file name and comes fully Acidized for Magix’s Acid, Rexxed for Recycle, or Apple Looped for use in Logic ProX, Garageband and works in all your favorite DAWs. Bass performed by Adonis Tsilimparis. Loops cut and formatted by Soundtrack Loops advance audio surgeons and formatting team. All loops are guaranteed to work seamlessly on tempo and continuous looping.

blue3organ.description_text: Blue3 is a meticulously modeled — not sampled — virtual instrument that replicates the most famous tonewheel organs in the world: the B-3, C-3, A-100, L-100, CV, and M-3 models. With 31 tonewheel sets accurately capturing variations between vintage instruments, 91 modeled tonewheels with phase synchronization, and authentically emulated scanner vibrato/chorus, Blue3 delivers the iconic, soulful sounds associated with nearly a century of blues, gospel, rock, and jazz classics.

filtomikafilter.description_text: Filtomika is an effect plugin that emulates the wild filter section of the 1980s Soviet Polivoks synthesizer and is based on the expanded multi-mode filter introduced in Cherry Audio's award-winning Atomika virtual instrument. Featuring circuit-modeled DSP designs by the acclaimed developer Mark Barton, Filtomika also includes other methods from Atomika that go beyond the original hardware. These enhancements include an extended selection of waveforms for its syncable modulator, additional filter response modes, and Atomika's unique Starve, Filter Drive, and Amp Drive controls, further expanding its twisted sound palette.

looptheorychillswag.description_text: Relax and chill as luring melodies and trapped rhythmic beats multiply and subtract from your memory. Toy pianos and airy synth pads are followed by echoing bass sounds while big leads and vocals shout at the world around them. In this blissfully recorded Chill Trap genre, Loop Theory at his new studio in Paris “Transcode Recordings” used this recent move into a chaotic every changing city to bring us Chill Swag and its perfect for many different genres including Pop, Cinematic music beds, Hip Hop and EDM.

chillouthouse.description_text: Adrian Walther “Iced Chillout Lounge”, “Fresh Mood”, and “Deep Chill” with Peace Love Productions team up to bring you this massive construction kit for producing Chillout, Deep, and Lounge House. Contains 58 mini construction kit sessions designed to be mixed and matched. 416 loops. Also includes 25 synth riff midi files. Royalty Free Loops. Tempos range from 110 – 125 BPMs. Features: 58 Construction Kits | 416 Royalty Free Chillout Loops | 25 MIDI | 24 bit 44.1 Stereo Files | Available in Universal .WAV, Apple Loop .AIFF, and Recycle .RX2

ukuleleensemble.description_text:
Strum your way into a fresh creative space with Ukulele Ensemble, a one-of-a-kind loop pack built entirely from the rich, layered tones of baritone, bass, tenor, alto, and soprano ukuleles. This unique collection features 10 fully structured song starter kits, each packed with 10 ukulele parts designed to be layered, rearranged, and remixed into full compositions.

With a total of 104 royalty-free loops, Ukulele Ensemble captures the warmth and charm of live ukes while offering the flexibility of a modern production toolkit. Whether you’re scoring an indie film, producing folk-pop, or adding a light acoustic texture to your beats, this pack gives you all the building blocks to create songs using nothing but ukuleles.

groovetoolbox.description_text: Funky Beats Drum Loops are pristine 24 bit, 44.1kHz authentic live drum grooves performed by world renown drummer Hari Ganglberger and recorded/ mixed by grammy nominated engineer Alex Theoret. Funky Beats live drum loops are tastefully mixed, ready to drop right into your productions but aren’t “overcooked”, leaving enough headroom to compress and eq to taste. As standard practice for all loops created by the Soundtrack Loops team, Key and BPM are tagged in both metadata and file names. Choose from ACIDized Wav, and Apple-looped AIFF. All beats are from real organic drums mic’ed up.

elka-xsynthesizer.description_text: The Cherry Audio Elka-X synthesizer is based upon the legendary Synthex, a rare Italian analog synthesizer designed by Mario Maggi and manufactured by ELKA in the early eighties. Elka-X replicates the extraordinary character of the original synth without compromising sound or functionality, thoughtfully expanding its feature set and delivering the authentic Synthex experience at a price anyone can afford.

cyberpunkpulse.description_text: Immerse yourself in the neon-lit, dystopian world of cyberpunk with Cyberpunk Pulse – Loops & MIDI. This high-energy collection is packed with pulsing basslines, futuristic synth leads, and pounding beats, all designed to inject a dark, cinematic edge into your productions. Whether you’re crafting gritty electronic soundscapes, synthwave-inspired tracks, or game/film scores, this pack delivers cutting-edge sounds straight from the digital underworld. 116 loops, 85 one-shots, 39 MIDI files.

djpuzzledrumnbassaction.human_name: Dj Puzzle Drum n Bass Action
djpuzzledrumnbassaction.description_text: Drum n Bass Action is a fast paced set of quick and grooving loops that will get you on the fast track to producing authentic action-packed Drum n Bass. Sounds include drums, basses, SFX, rolling bass-lines, growling basses, jazzy chord stabs, wobbles, grooving drum FX, percussion, kicks, snares, ambient pads, and everything else in between. There are 453 files in this pack. 299 loops, 100 drum one-shots, 54 synth shots. It’s an amazing deal for the price. Each loop is tempo sync and formatted with proper meta data. Tempos range from 140-180 BPM. Choose from ACIDized Wav and Apple-looped Aiff. Features: 299 DnB Loops | 144 One-Shots | .WAV, .ALP, & .AIFF Formats Available. 24 bit 44.1kHz.

garypickus.description_text: Soundtrack Loops introduces Gary Pickus: Piano MIDI Loops. Try before you buy! Click here to get 5 free files from the pack. Step into a world of expressive storytelling with Gary Pickus’ Royalty-Free Piano MIDI & Loops pack, a refined collection for composers and producers. Featuring 201 meticulously crafted MIDI piano performances across a wide range of genres—each paired with companion audio loops for easy previewing—this pack delivers instant inspiration. It showcases Gary’s signature cinematic touch, emotional depth, and nuanced phrasing, all refined through decades of experience scoring for film, television, and theater. 201 MII files, 201 loops.

djpuzzledowntempolounge.description_text: This complete “construction kit” set of loops and samples has something for every producer of Downtempo, Trip Hop, Down Beat, and Chillout. Every loop is the perfect blend of isolated layers that will get you creating your own tunes with little effort. They’ll inspire you on those days when you really need a boost. All of the drums are separated by instrument such as Hi Hats, Percussion, Kicks, and Snares. Sounds include, Strings, Basses, Percussion, Turntable FX, Pads, Sound Effects, and more. This is a great single collection of loops but it will also make for a great companion to any collection. 13 song session folders. 195 royalty free loops cut with precision. Session folders are organized by BPM and Key. Features: 195 Royalty Free Downtempo Lounge Loops | 24 bit 44.1 Stereo Files

reggaetonwithvocals.description_text: Reggaeton w/ Vocals is a set of 10 construction kits for producing Reggaeton and Moombahton. It features vocals from Latin duo “NorthRock 360”. NortRock 360 is known for winning four National Competitions, being nominated for a 2009 CMA for Best Latin / Urban / Reggaeton group, & headlining with some of the industry’s most prominent artists, these strong-minded performers have become reliable in exciting fans & booking sold out shows. You’ll get everything you need to get started with your Reggaeton beats. Includes vocals, basses, synths, percussion, SFX, and more. 103 loops, 53 one-shots, and 10 construction kits. The instrumentals for Reggaeton w/Vocals were composed and produced by award winning producer Jason Donnelly (Dj Puzzle). Available in pristine 44.1 kHz Stereo 24 bit files.

fire808melodies.description_text:
Soundtrack Loops intros their latest royalty-free audio pack, Fire 808 Melodies – Loops & MIDI. Ignite your beats with “Fire 808 Melodies Loops & MIDI,” a top-tier collection designed to infuse your music with powerful, deep bass and vibrant melodies. This comprehensive pack features 341 files, including 180 loops and 161 MIDI files, ensuring you have the perfect combination of ready-to-use sounds and customizable elements to craft your signature Hip Hop and Trap tracks produced by Evicc Beatz. What’s Inside:

180 WAV/AIFF Loops

161 MIDI Files

Various tempos and keys for diverse creative opportunities.

glowave.description_text: Step into the luminous world of GloWave – Loops, MIDI, & One-shots a curated sound library that captures the soul of retro electronic music while pushing it into radiant, uncharted territory. More than just a collection, Glowave is a genre-defining toolkit—a celebration of shimmering synth textures, neon-washed melodies, deep bass pulses, and futuristic atmospheres. Whether you’re crafting chilled-out beats, euphoric dance tracks, or cinematic soundscapes, Glowave delivers the essential sonic palette to bring your visions to life. 205 loops, 145 One-shots, 59 MIDI files.

25voucherwithsoundtrackloops.description_text:
Get $25 in Soundtrack Loops store credit to use on any pack or bundle available on SoundtrackLoops.com. This store credit gives you the flexibility to choose from a wide range of high-quality music loops, sound packs, and audio resources for your creative projects.

Perfect for musicians, producers, and content creators, this credit lets you explore new sounds and expand your audio library while saving money. Simply apply the credit at checkout and use it on the products you want most.

sci-fiunderscores.description_text:
Introducing Sci-Fi Underscores: a royalty-free audio pack designed to elevate your music projects with futuristic and otherworldly soundscapes. Featuring 147 tempo-locked instrument stems, including pianos, strings, synth pads, atmospheres, and basses, this pack ensures seamless integration and versatility in applications like Logic Pro and Ableton Live. Created with composer Adonis Tsilimparis, known for his work on NCIS: Los Angeles and CSI: NY, it offers profound, emotional chord progressions and sounds. Perfect for scoring sci-fi epics, designing ambient backgrounds, or experimenting with new sonic textures. What’s Inside:

Cosmic Pads: Elevate your scenes with lush, evolving pads that transport your audience to the farthest reaches of the galaxy.

Ambient Textures: Add depth and dimension with haunting textures that set the perfect mood for any sci-fi setting.

Futuristic Soundscapes: Paint vivid sonic landscapes with rich, otherworldly soundscapes designed to evoke the mysteries of the universe.

Ethereal Atmospheres: Infuse your projects with ethereal atmospheres that bring a sense of wonder and awe to your storytelling.

ps-20synthesizer.description_text: PS-20 is an ultra-realistic, polyphonic, hot-rodded tribute to Korg's renowned MS-20. First and foremost, PS-20's dual highpass/lowpass filters super accurately recreate the MS-20's famous raunchy sound in all of its squelchy, screaming glory. In addition to its unique filters, the MS-20’s other signature feature is its modular-style patch panel. We’ve reconfigured the patch panel from the original instrument, adding many desired in and out patch points for all oscillators, filters, and VCAs, correcting the confusing terminology of the original, and throwing in a few extras that greatly expand its usability.

synthsoundsofmontra.description_text:
Synth Sounds of Montra – Genre – is a versatile collection of multi-purpose synthesizer loops ideal for producing original Downtempo, Left-field, Chillout, Ambient, Movie Score, and Soundtracks. Each loop was meticulously tweaked live by focusing on layering, modulation, and depth. Montras’ of hardware only synthesizers gives these loops more depth and feel to each, they creates an eclectic mix of sounds that whisk you away and brings forth an entanglement of genres to inspire your next unique productions. The tempos range from 65-120 BPM and there are a ton of different keys to choose from. Sounds include glitched rhythms, ambient pads, synths, basses, chillout pads, bells, SFX, and so much more.

Produced by Matthew Yost (DJ Montra) producer of Cinematic Synths, Downtempo Synths, and Ambient Space — all available at Soundtrack Loops. 24 bit 44.1 kHz Stereo. Features: 201 Royalty Free Cinematic Loops | 24 bit 44.1 Stereo Files

datenightrnb.description_text: Dim the lights, fire up a couple candles, pour two glasses of the best wine, and turn up these smooth RnB jams. Date Night RnB is a set of 42 RnB loops and 29 midi files across 6 construction kits. Impress your significant other and put them in the mood with these sexy kits. Date Night RnB will put anyone in the mood for love. You’ll get rhodes, strings, basses, drums, pads, pianos, and more. 24 bit 44.1kHz Stereo files. Features: 42 Royalty Free R&B Loops | 29 MIDI | Universal .WAV, Apple Looped .AIFF, & Ableton LIVE Included | 44.1kHz 24 bit stereo files.

electropop.description_text: Add a bit of a mainstream, Radio friendly, Pop element to your tunes, “Elektro Pop” by Soundtrack Loops. “Elektro Pop” is a set of 11 royalty free construction kits suitable for K Pop, EDM, Dance, Pop, and Dubstep. In total there are 175 loops. Sounds include drums, subs, leads, pianos, melodies, pads, risers, snare rolls, and SFX. Tempos range from 120 to 140 BPMs. 24 bit 44.1kHz Stereo files. Features: 175 Royalty Free Elektro Pop Loops | Universal .WAV, & Apple Looped .AIFF Included | 44.1kHz 24 bit stereo files.

deephouse.description_text: This Deep House set comes complete with: huge white noise splashes, intense risers, deep basses, tribal percussion, funky beats, swung rhythms, crispy high hats, full synth chords, punchy hits, round subby kicks, poppy snares, latin melodies, disco stabs, acid synth lines, energy filled drum tops, floor filling combinations, funky electric guitars, mind bending transitional effects, and so much more.

cumbia.description_text: Soundtrack Loops intros Cumbia Hip Hop Loops. Embark on a sonic journey from the Sonoran desert to the Midwest as Aztec hip hop pioneer Uriel Lopez, renowned as Uriel y los Hackers, One More López, and Skinny Boys, delivers a mesmerizing blend of boom bap, trap, and reggaeton infused with Latin rhythms, notably influenced by the vibrant Colombian Cumbia. Drawing from his roots in Latin Rock with Hecho en Mexico and his ventures with The Prole in Madison, Wisconsin, Lopez brings his eclectic style to life in this sensational library. Each loop echoes with the richness of his musical experiences, Features: 470 Royalty Free Cumbia Hip Hop Loops | ACIDized .WAV, & Apple Looped .AIFF Included | 44.1kHz 24 bit stereo files. offering a diverse array of sounds to enhance your compositions. Dive into this collection of 470 Cumbia Hip Hop Loops, ranging from 70 to 100 BPM, in pristine 24-bit, 44.1kHz stereo quality, featuring an extensive range of instruments including percussions, accordion, electric guitar, trombones, 808s, SFX, and more, and infuse your music with vibrant energy and infectious rhythms.

funkytechhouse.description_text:
Soundtrack Loops intros Funky Tech House. Dive into the groovy world of Funky Tech House with our exclusive Multi-Pack. This premium collection, crafted by the sound design maestros at Soundtrack Loops, offers a dynamic range of loops and samples tailored to elevate your house music productions. Whether you’re a veteran producer or a budding beatmaker, this pack equips you with the essential tools to craft irresistible, dance-floor anthems that will keep the crowd moving all night long. What’s Inside

Sample Pack Formats: Acidized .WAV, Ableton Live Packs, Apple-looped AIFF

Total Content: All Formats Unzipped 2.11 GB

Loops: 165

Drum One-Shots: 126

MIDI: 46

Drum Racks / Kits: 1

10 Instruments: Guitars Basses, Chords, FX, Pads, Percussion, Synths, Vocals

mixcraft106homestudioforwindows.description_text: Mixcraft 10.6 Home Studio is the super affordable, entry-level version of Mixcraft. Designed for aspiring musicians, producers, creators, and music technology educators, Mixcraft 10.6 Home Studio offers a professional-grade suite of features at an affordable price. This user-friendly DAW allows users to easily record up to 16 audio and MIDI instrument tracks, arrange loops, remix projects, edit video, and mix and master their compositions – all with Acoustica's signature ease and flexibility. Let your creativity fly with thousands of music loops and dozens of audio effects and virtual instruments. Take the stage with eight sets of automatically synced, non-stop audio and MIDI clip grooves using the amazingly flexible Performance Panel, the perfect partner for live performances. Mixcraft 10.6 Home Studio is the ideal introduction to digital music creation at a price anyone can afford.

trapedm.description_text: Soundtrack Loops intros Trap EDM – Loops & One-shots. Trap EDM by Dylan Swirkal (Melodic Techno, Drum ‘n’ Bass Synths, Tech House Punch, Indie Pop) is a collection of loops and one shots with lush sonics and a sunny, laid back feel. Dylan knows how to design sample libraries that bring good vibes straightaway—in the glow of inspiring and flexible sounds, nested in complete and easy-to-access construction kits that all feature great organization and perfect balance. Here, nine instrument folders break out into a total of 98 loops, 24 of which comprise kit drum breakout layers and 808 samples, tailor made for designing textbook bone dry trap foundations. 10 different bass lines range from clean and smooth to moderately edgy, and the rest of the material brings everything else you need to make complete tracks—synth-generated chord progressions and arpeggios as well as all the leads, pads and effects you need to make fully produced tracks with positive soulful energy. Trap EDM is not overly aggressive by nature, but that said, the sounds do cut pretty hard, with articulate and well-polished edges that can certainly generate great mixes right out the gate with ease. That said, serious producers will be happy to have a fine set of clean and punchy sounds on hand for exercising all their music production tricks, to arrive at spaces that carry their original trademarks. Features: 98 Royalty Free Trap EDM Loops | 20 One-shots | Universal .WAV, & Apple Looped .AIFF Included | 48.1kHz 24 bit stereo files.

neonwave.description_text: Enter the electric glow of the future with Neon Wave – Loops, MIDI, & One-shots — a sleek, high-fidelity sound library designed for modern producers, remixers, and creators who live for that shimmering synth-driven edge. Whether you’re building cinematic intros, retro-futuristic compositions, or EDM tracks with attitude, this collection gives you all the Synthwave loops and Synthwave samples you need to capture the luminous pulse of Neon Wave. 185 loops, 8 one-shots, 56 MIDI files

harmoniasynthesizer.description_text: Harmonia is the latest wildly innovative virtual instrument from Cherry Audio, designed to easily create rich, evolving polyphonic tones through its intuitive visual interface. The magic behind Harmonia lies in its two sample-based oscillators. Using techniques similar to those found in additive synthesis, each Harmonia oscillator can simultaneously produce up to eight pitches, individually tuned to a harmonic series or semitones. The volume for each pitch harmonic can be fixed or dynamic, and Harmonia’s unique interpolated harmonic scanning enables dramatic sweeps and melodious sequences through a single modulatable slider.

kidsfoley.description_text: Soundtrack Loops intros Kids – Toys & Play Foleys. Right on time, Mexico City-based producer Edgar Lopez delivers Kids: Toys & Play Foleys. We’ll start by stating the obvious: if you create children’s music, you need this. To understand the rest of the story, it helps to know that Edgar is a renaissance man of forms: authentic, deep, and sophisticated music aesthetics that span genres; globe-spanning grooves with amazing feels and variations; production chops that favor super-crisp, very forward, and highly articulated music and sound, and throughout, an incomparable and compelling identity and personality. If you enjoy this unique and refreshing mix of music and Foley, make sure to check out Soundtrack Loops’ complete catalog of Edgar Lopez-produced titles, including Frightening Sounds; Human Body; Industrial Complex; Kitchen Things; Mexico City; Motors, Machines, and Metal Noises; Office; Sports Foleys & SFX and Trash. Merge the 120 mixed beat loops (rendered at 75, 100, and 120 BPM) and 108 one shots included with Toys & Play Foleys into our extensive Edgar Lopez-produced catalog of ingenious assets, and explore a big and brilliant set of absolutely delightful and inspiring music and sound. These titles will propel you into new spaces in pop, hip-hop, and every subgenre of electronic and world music.

littlekidsrock.description_text:
Donations to support Musci Will are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Music Will runs the largest nonprofit music program in the US public school system. Our teachers currently serve over 500,000 students in more than 600 cities and towns across the country.

We believe that music education is a right, not a privilege, and it should reflect the cultures of the students it serves.

That’s why, for two decades now, our programs have taught students such popular American genres as rock, pop, R&B, Latin, rap and country—alongside styles already taught in schools, such as classical and jazz.

Today, a national network of K-12 districts has adopted the Music Will program as their own.

More than 70 colleges and universities now teach our approach to their music education majors. Several state departments of education have partnered with Music Will to grow music education in the schools they serve.

Our mission of transforming lives by transforming music education has grown into a movement.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Make Music, Change Lives
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Cumbia, Ukelele, Glowave, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb:
It’s not easy to compose the perfect piece, but an asset library full of beats, clips, and instruments certainly helps. Our latest bundle has the ideal mix of sound files and melodies that span every genre you can think up, from orchestral epics to house beats to the cyberpunk trills of the future. Inside you’ll find looping synths, organs, guitars, and even a ukulele ensemble alongside a variety of genres like cumbia, R&B, funk, and alt rock—perfect for crafting the fitting atmospheres for all your creative projects.

Valued at roughly $970, this collection includes well over 10,000 loops, samples, and MIDI files for your productions. Soundtrack Loops contributes 7,559 professionally produced sounds, and at the top-tier bundle, the included Mixcraft DAW adds thousands more instruments, effects, and loops you can use to build full arrangements. Everything is royalty-free and ready for use in popular music software.

You choose what you pay to make the sound you’re looking for—and help fund student music programs with Music Will through your purchase!
from_bundle.author: SOUNDTRACK LOOPS
